trans-unit.source: Controls the deceleration of a rotation manipulation during inertia.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer deselerasjon for en rotasjon redigeringen under treghet.

trans-unit.source: The InertiaRotationBehavior class specifies how a rotation manipulation behaves when it is inertia.
trans-unit.target: Klassen InertiaRotationBehavior angir en rotasjon redigeringen virkemåten når den er treghet.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> event to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting>-hendelsen for å gjøre følgende:-Angi den opprinnelige hastigheten på treghet når det begynner ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den ønskede roteringen for redigeringen når treghet slutter ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Angi den ønskede deselerasjon for treghet ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Angi enten den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, men ikke begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> if it has a value.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir én av disse egenskapene, den andre egenskapen endres til <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>Hvis den har en verdi.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om endringer i den [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på et program som svarer på endringer, kan du se [gjennomgang: opprette din første Touch programmet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir roteringen reduserer i grader per kvadrerte millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: Use the DesiredDeceleration property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DesiredDeceleration-egenskapen til å angi den ønskede deselerasjon for treghet.

trans-unit.source: Set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> or the DesiredDeceleration, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Angi enten den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>eller DesiredDeceleration, men ikke begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> if it has a value.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir én av disse egenskapene, den andre egenskapen endres til <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>Hvis den har en verdi.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om endringer i den [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på et program som svarer på endringer, kan du se [gjennomgang: opprette din første Touch programmet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.
trans-unit.target: Hvor ofte roteringen reduserer i grader per kvadrerte millisekunder.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to infinity.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er satt til infinity.

trans-unit.source: -or- The property is set to <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - egenskapen er satt til <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rotation, in degrees, at the end of the inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir roteringen, i grader på slutten av inertial flytting.

trans-unit.source: Use the DesiredRotation property to specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DesiredRotation-egenskapen til å angi den ønskede roteringen for redigeringen når treghet slutter.

trans-unit.source: Set either the DesiredRotation or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Angi enten DesiredRotation eller <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, men ikke begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> if it has a value.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir én av disse egenskapene, den andre egenskapen endres til <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>Hvis den har en verdi.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om endringer i den [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på et program som svarer på endringer, kan du se [gjennomgang: opprette din første Touch programmet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The rotation, in degrees, at the end of the inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: Rotasjon i grader på slutten av inertial flytting.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial rate of the rotation at the start of the inertia phase.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir opprinnelige roteringen ved starten av treghet fase.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om endringer i den [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på et program som svarer på endringer, kan du se [gjennomgang: opprette din første Touch programmet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The initial rate of the rotation at the start of the inertia phase.
trans-unit.target: Opprinnelig antall rotasjonen ved starten av treghet fase.
